name: I'mBored
0:
”Alexa, I'm bored”
”Alexa, start I'm bored”
”Alexa, run I'm bored”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: i'm bored
des:
Alexa can already read you the news and forecast the weather, so why shouldn't she be able to help eliminate your boredom? Now with I'm Bored, she can.

Activities are pulled from a growing list of ideas from various categories to find ways to keep you engaged and productive.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
